---

- Create a `git` repo.

- Check `git` credentials within the project repo upon cloning:

```{.bash filename="Terminal"}
git config user.name
git config user.email
```

- If necessary, change `git` credentials at the repo level:

```{.bash filename="Terminal"}
git config user.name "..."
git config user.email "...@..."
```

- If necessary, change `git` credentials globally:

```{.bash filename="Terminal"}
git config --global user.name "..."
git config ---global user.email "...@..."
```

- Create a `Teams`/`Slack` channel.
